string-array.name: questions_array
string-array.item: A person can survive two weeks without water
Programmers have the highest suicide rate amongst professions
Adding salt to gypsum will fasten its binding
A person can get sunburned on a cloudy day
The most frequent subconscious activity repeated by the human body is blinking
Type 1 diabetes is a result of the liver working improperly
Psychology is the science of behavior and mind
Mobile devices programming is the best course at the University
